title: Bootstrap Fusbal governed project: requirements, provenance, evidence, portal
summary: This intent boots Fusbal into a governed state from day 1 (no backfills).
All human-readable .md files are generated; humans edit spec/templates only.
Delivery plans are represented as intents and work packages, then surfaced via portal/status outputs.
non_goals: Implement any vision/pipeline product capabilities (this is governance scaffolding only).
Introduce machine-specific paths or coupling to other repositories.
success_criteria: `npm run generate` and `npm run guardrails` pass on a clean repo.
Internal portal starts and can browse intents/tasks; Refresh regenerates surfaces.
Evidence run records can be created as JSON artifacts under status/audit/.

quality_areas.title: Functional objectives
objectives: Deterministic generators + canonical templates exist and run end-to-end.
Evidence run records can be created as JSON artifacts under status/audit/.
Internal portal can browse intents/tasks and trigger refresh.

quality_areas.title: Non-functional objectives
objectives: Guardrails enforce governance invariants and detect drift deterministically.
Provenance/REQ tagging is enforced and usable for audits.
Prompts/runbooks are explicit and reduce operator error.

work_packages.title: Repo scaffolding + generation
items: TASK-BOOT-001 Deterministic generators + canonical templates for governed surfaces (no .md hand-edits).
TASK-BOOT-002 Guardrails enforcing governance invariants + provenance/requirements discipline.

work_packages.title: Evidence + portal
items: TASK-BOOT-003 Evidence run recorder + internal portal pages (intents/tasks + refresh).
TASK-BOOT-004 Generated docs templates for navigation, runbooks, and delivery plan surfaces.
